name: Shadow Storm
description:
The game revolves around Shadow who is on a mission to fight the evil intentions of Oil Mafia who has taken over the world in the aftermath of Clean Energy Initiatives breaking down.

Play like a Shadow with Stealth (Calm Mode) or like an Assassin (Storm Mode).

In this demo, she finds herself raiding the facility of her nemesis when she hears the arrival of a mysterious package.

P.S: This is a demo of the game and contains one level only. This game was made for BoltJam#3
